turns.content: Who is your favorite musician of all time, and why?

Okay, let's talk about music then. Can you recommend me some good rock bands from the 80s? I want to expand my music taste.

Sure, here are some iconic rock bands from the 80s that you might enjoy:

1. Guns N' Roses - Known for their hard-rocking sound and intense lyrics, Guns N' Roses is still one of the most famous rock bands of all time. Their albums "Appetite for Destruction" and "Use Your Illusion" are must-listens for fans of rock music.

2. Van Halen - With their catchy guitar riffs and energetic performances, Van Halen became one of the most successful bands of the 80s. They had a string of hits throughout the decade, including "Jump," "Panama," and "Hot for Teacher."

3. Bon Jovi - Known for their anthemic rock ballads and catchy hooks, Bon Jovi has sold over 100 million records worldwide. Their classic hits like "Livin' on a Prayer" and "Wanted Dead or Alive" are still popular today.

4. AC/DC - AC/DC's 80s albums like "Back in Black" and "Highway to Hell" are some of the most iconic rock records ever made. Their heavy guitar riffs and frontman Brian Johnson's raspy vocals made them one of the most distinct bands of the decade.

5. Def Leppard - With their melodic rock and heavy use of vocal harmonies, Def Leppard's music was both catchy and anthemic. Their album "Hysteria" was a huge commercial success, selling over 20 million copies worldwide.

I hope this helps you find some great music from the 80s!
